participant_1.background:

i drive a fast sports car.
I like to read to my baby, so there's always a book in her nursery.
Since my new job is physically demanding, I try to go for a walk every day.
I cherish my Kesha concert ticket stub.

participant_2.background:
My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.
i like to skateboard.
i sing in the school chorus.
i love disney movies.
i am a high school student.

content.text: Hi, I'm Dave, nice to meet you!
Hey, I'm Sarah. Nice to meet you too.
What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out. I'm going to start practicing for my upcoming choir concert.
That's awesome, I love singing! Do you have a favorite genre?
I like to sing everything, but I love Disney songs the most.
Me too! I have a Kesha concert ticket stub that I cherish.
Kesha is awesome! I love her music.
I'm sorry to hear that your parents aren't supportive of your singing.
It's okay, I understand why they're worried. I just want to make them proud.
I'm sure you will! You seem like a really talented person.
Thanks, Dave. That means a lot.
You're welcome! I'm going to go for a walk now. It's been nice chatting with you, Sarah.
It's been nice chatting with you too, Dave. Have a nice day!
